problem.markdown: >>Which of the following is not a real edX log event_type?<< (!) load_video ( ) edx.video.loaded ( ) edx.course.student_notes.added ( ) reset-all-attempts (x) edx.problem.incorrect ||Don't have them all memorized? We don't blame you. You might want to go hunting for a list...|| [explanation] The equivalent event is problem_check_fail. Here's a link to the full list of event types. You can see that the naming conventions are not entirely consistent. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following is not a real edX log event_type?

div.p: The equivalent event is problem_check_fail. Here's a link to the full list of event types.
You can see that the naming conventions are not entirely consistent.

demandhint.hint: Don't have them all memorized? We don't blame you. You might want to go hunting for a list...
